key_risks: Antitrust litigation and potential breakup of Live Nation-Ticketmaster
High debt levels and financial overvaluation
Ongoing legal exposure from antitrust cases and arbitration rulings
controversies: Ticketmaster's high service fees and dynamic pricing practices
Event safety concerns, including past incidents linked to deaths and injuries
Data privacy issues related to fan data collection
environmental_issues: Sustainability initiatives to reduce carbon emissions and promote eco-friendly practices
social_issues: Criticism over monopolistic practices and anti-competitive behavior
Public backlash over event safety and crowd control
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and potential structural changes due to antitrust lawsuit
Negative outlook from S&P Global due to financial and legal risks

sources.title: Live Nation Bid to Avoid Antitrust Suit Seen Falling Short (1)
